ingredients.name: Tomatoes
ingredients.quick_facts: Rich in vitamin C, commonly used in salads and sauces.
ingredients.fun_facts: Tomatoes are technically berries! They're also known for their umami flavor.

ingredients.name: Avocado
ingredients.quick_facts: High in healthy fats and great for making guacamole.
ingredients.fun_facts: Avocado is a fruit and a berry, but not a vegetable!

ingredients.name: Strawberries
ingredients.quick_facts: Sweet and juicy, excellent in desserts and smoothies.
ingredients.fun_facts: Strawberries are the only fruit with seeds on the outside.

ingredients.name: Bananas
ingredients.quick_facts: High in potassium and a great source of energy.
ingredients.fun_facts: Bananas are technically berries!

ingredients.name: Spinach
ingredients.quick_facts: Packed with vitamins and minerals, especially iron.
ingredients.fun_facts: Spinach was Popeye's secret for super strength!

ingredients.name: Chicken
ingredients.quick_facts: A lean source of protein and versatile for various cuisines.
ingredients.fun_facts: There are more chickens on Earth than people!

ingredients.name: Broccoli
ingredients.quick_facts: High in fiber and vitamin C, great for stir-fries.
ingredients.fun_facts: Broccoli is a cousin of cauliflower!

ingredients.name: Eggs
ingredients.quick_facts: An excellent source of protein and versatile for breakfast dishes.
ingredients.fun_facts: An ostrich egg is equivalent to 24 chicken eggs!

ingredients.name: Potatoes
ingredients.quick_facts: Versatile and a great source of carbohydrates.
ingredients.fun_facts: Potatoes were the first vegetable to be grown in space!

ingredients.name: Onions
ingredients.quick_facts: A staple in many cuisines, adds flavor to dishes.
ingredients.fun_facts: Onions were used as currency in some ancient cultures!

ingredients.name: Chocolate
ingredients.quick_facts: A beloved sweet ingredient for desserts and treats.
ingredients.fun_facts: The world's largest chocolate bar weighed over 12,000 pounds!

ingredients.name: Lemons
ingredients.quick_facts: Tangy and zesty, rich in vitamin C.
ingredients.fun_facts: Lemons can power a small digital watch with their acidity!

ingredients.name: Garlic
ingredients.quick_facts: Adds a robust flavor to dishes, known for its health benefits.
ingredients.fun_facts: The world consumes over 80 million tons of garlic each year!

ingredients.name: Pasta
ingredients.quick_facts: A staple in Italian cuisine, comes in various shapes and sizes.
ingredients.fun_facts: There are over 600 different pasta shapes around the world!

ingredients.name: Salmon
ingredients.quick_facts: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids, a popular fish for cooking.
ingredients.fun_facts: Some salmon can jump up to 12 feet in the air!

ingredients.name: Rice
ingredients.quick_facts: A staple food for many cultures, comes in different varieties.
ingredients.fun_facts: Rice is the primary food source for over half of the world's population!

ingredients.name: Cilantro
ingredients.quick_facts: A fresh herb with a bright, citrusy flavor.
ingredients.fun_facts: Cilantro is also known as coriander leaf and is widely used in Asian and Latin American cuisines.

ingredients.name: Olive Oil
ingredients.quick_facts: A heart-healthy oil used for cooking and dressing.
ingredients.fun_facts: Olive oil has been produced for over 5,000 years!

ingredients.name: Carrots
ingredients.quick_facts: Rich in vitamin A, excellent for snacking and cooking.
ingredients.fun_facts: Carrots were originally purple and not orange!

ingredients.name: Apples
ingredients.quick_facts: A popular fruit known for its sweet and crisp taste.
ingredients.fun_facts: There are over 7,500 apple varieties grown worldwide!

ingredients.name: Pineapple
ingredients.quick_facts: Tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor.
ingredients.fun_facts: Pineapple is actually a collection of berries fused together!

ingredients.name: Peppers
ingredients.quick_facts: Come in various colors, adds color and flavor to dishes.
ingredients.fun_facts: Bell peppers are related to chili peppers!

ingredients.name: Mushrooms
ingredients.quick_facts: Fungi with a unique earthy flavor, versatile for many dishes.
ingredients.fun_facts: Mushrooms are more closely related to humans than plants!

ingredients.name: Honey
ingredients.quick_facts: Natural sweetener produced by bees, used in baking and cooking.
ingredients.fun_facts: Honey never spoils; archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs!

ingredients.name: Lettuce
ingredients.quick_facts: Crunchy and refreshing, a staple in salads and sandwiches.
ingredients.fun_facts: Lettuce is part of the daisy family!

ingredients.name: Cucumbers
ingredients.quick_facts: Cool and hydrating, great for salads and pickling.
ingredients.fun_facts: Cucumbers belong to the same plant family as pumpkins and zucchinis!

ingredients.name: Peaches
ingredients.quick_facts: Sweet and juicy stone fruit, a summer favorite.
ingredients.fun_facts: Georgia is known as the Peach State in the U.S.!

ingredients.name: Basil
ingredients.quick_facts: A fragrant herb used in Italian and Mediterranean dishes.
ingredients.fun_facts: Basil is considered a symbol of love in some cultures!

ingredients.name: Black Beans
ingredients.quick_facts: Protein-rich legume used in various cuisines.
ingredients.fun_facts: Black beans are a staple in Latin American cuisine!

ingredients.name: Pears
ingredients.quick_facts: Sweet and juicy fruit with a pear-shaped appearance.
ingredients.fun_facts: There are over 3,000 varieties of pears worldwide!
